channel.title: Projects on Gavin Fowler
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Gavin Fowler

item.title: Restaurant Picker
item.description: RestaurantPicker is an app to help people in groups decide where to eat. This app was developed for MIS 5700 at USU. The project was to create any sort of web-based service that could grow into a business. Most groups chose an Amazon-style website where things could be sold from either their company, who would make the products or the community, in a kind of Uber-style application. My team decided to do something different, create an application that would help groups of friends decide where to eat.

item.title: LaTeX to HTML
item.description: Link to LaTeX to HTML One of the projects I recently undertook was a chrome extension that would accept LaTeX as input and output HTML code that would render the LaTeX in a nice format. At my job at the Space Dynamics Lab, I was able to do something similar. We had some units that we wanted to render in a pretty format, for example, if we had ‘sec/m^2’ we could render it as:
